alert.note: Alert for Grundy; La Salle (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern La Salle and southwestern Grundy Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 511 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Earlville to near Ottawa to 9 miles east of Streator. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Serena around 520 PM CDT. Marseilles around 525 PM CDT. Lake Holiday and Seneca around 540 PM CDT. Sheridan and Somonauk around 545 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Kinsman, Norway, Verona, Ransom, Harding, Dayton, Wedron and Millington. Including the following interstates... I-55 near mile marker 221. I-80 between mile markers 88 and 105. This includes... Illini State Park. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
